name: Skyfloor: Here Time Flies
description:
SkyFloor , Interactive first person time-bound run Above the clouds, In the sky.  

Floats a floor and yet, you feel like you are flying. 

 But the wind blows over and totally spoils your path. BEWARE! 

There are some pits, try not to fall. (Spoiler Alert : You will fall.)

 Float like an eagle or crawl like a turtle. Jump through the bumps or duck from the obstacles. But also keep an eye on the time, it might run away.

 Collect all the time capsules to stay in the game and make a high-score. Beat 'em all. TRY NOT TO GET ADDICTED TO THIS GAME !!
